BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO PISLEG_CASE_CONCOUR_TRN (GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,DT_DATE_OF_CONTEMPT, DT_DATE_OF_CONTEMPT_FILED , STR_CASE_ID,STR_CASE_NUMBER, STR_CONTEMPT_NUMBER, STR_TYP_AND_DESC_OF_CONTEMPT, STR_STATUS_OF_CONTEMPT,GDT_EFFECT_DATE, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GNUM_ISVALID,GNUM_SEAT_ID, GDT_LSTMOD_DATE, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID) VALUES (?,to_date(?,'DD-Mon-YYYY'),to_date(?,'DD-Mon-YYYY'),?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'DD-Mon-YYYY'),to_date(?,'DD-Mon-YYYY'),?,?,to_date(?,'DD-Mon-YYYY'),nvl(?,null))

UPDATE PISLEG_CASE_CONCOUR_TRN SET DT_DATE_OF_CONTEMPT=to_date(?,'DD-Mon-YYYY'), DT_DATE_OF_CONTEMPT_FILED=to_date(?,'DD-Mon-YYYY'), STR_CONTEMPT_NUMBER=?, STR_TYP_AND_DESC_OF_CONTEMPT=?, STR_STATUS_OF_CONTEMPT=?,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=to_date(?,'DD-Mon-YYYY'), GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=nvl(?,null) WHERE STR_CASE_NUMBER=? AND STR_CASE_ID=? and GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? AND STR_CONTEMPT_NUMBER=? AND GNUM_ISVALID=1
UPDATE PISLEG_CASE_CONCOUR_TRN SET GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE STR_CASE_ID=? AND STR_CASE_NUMBER =? and GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
